div.style: font-family: Cairo, Inter, sans-serif; line-height: 120%; text-align: center; direction: ltr; letter-spacing: 0px; mso-line-height-alt: 16.8px;

p.style: margin: 0; color: #c79922; font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 6px;

div.style: font-family: Cairo, Inter, sans-serif; line-height: 140%; text-align: left; direction: ltr; letter-spacing: 0px; mso-line-height-alt: 16.8px;
font-family: Cairo, Inter, sans-serif; line-height: 180%; text-align: left; direction: ltr; letter-spacing: 0px; mso-line-height-alt: 16.8px;
div.p:
Thank you for your interest in doing business with us. Kindly provide following information in order for me to provide the best suitable offer for you.
Legal type of the company (Sole ownership or Partnership)
License (Commercial, Consultancy, Ecommerce, General Trading, Media etc)?
Activity of the company?
What would be your residence visa requirements?
What is the time frame to start the process? If you require any clarification, please don't hesitate to contact me any time via email or my cell.

div.style: font-family: Cairo, Inter, sans-serif; line-height: 150%; text-align: left; direction: ltr; letter-spacing: 0px; mso-line-height-alt: 16.8px;

p.style: margin: 0; color: #020204; font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 40px;

div.p:
Looking forward to your reply.
Yours Sincerely,

div.style: font-family: Cairo, Inter, sans-serif; line-height: 120%; text-align: center !important; direction: ltr; letter-spacing: 0px; mso-line-height-alt: 16.8px;

p.style: margin: 0; color: #c79922; font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 6px;

div.style: font-family: Cairo, Inter, sans-serif; line-height: 140%; text-align: right; direction: rtl; letter-spacing: 0px; mso-line-height-alt: 16.8px;
font-family: Cairo, Inter, sans-serif; line-height: 180%; text-align: right; direction: rtl; letter-spacing: 0px; mso-line-height-alt: 16.8px;
div.p:
شكراً لاهتمامك بخدمات فريزونر وحرصك على التعاون معنا لتأسيس شركتك بالإمارات.
يُرجى توفير المعلومات التالية لنتمكن من تقديم أفضل عرض يتناسب مع احتياجاتك:
نوع الشركة من الناحية القانونية (فردية أم شراكة)؟
نوع الترخيص (تجاري، استشاري،تجارة إلكترونية، تجارة عامة,إعلام، وما إلى ذلك)؟
نشاط الشركة؟
متطلبات تأشيرة الإقامة الخاصة بك؟
الإطار الزمني المتوقع لبدء العملية؟
لا تتردد في التواصل معنا في أي وقت عبر البريد الإلكتروني أو الهاتف إذا كنت بحاجة إلى توضيح إضافي.
نتطلع إلى استلام ردك قريباً.

div.style: font-family: Cairo, Inter, sans-serif; line-height: 150%; text-align: right; direction: rtl; letter-spacing: 0px; mso-line-height-alt: 16.8px;

p.style: margin: 0; color: #020204; font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 40px;

div.p:
شكرًا لك
تفضلوا بقبول فائق الاحترام،

div.p:
Dear ,
Greetings from
Freezoner & thank you for your interest in opening a company with us.

div.style: font-family: Cairo, Inter, sans-serif; line-height: 180%; text-align: left; direction: ltr; letter-spacing: 0px; mso-line-height-alt: 16.8px;
div.p:
Freezoner s friendly and cost-effective company that helps investors establish their business in the most cost-effective & efficient way.
We are offering a wide variety of 1st class business setup services in UAE that suits every stage of your business journey in UAE.
Further to our discussion regarding your selected business activity, legal form, facility, and visa requirements, kindly find attached the company set up proposal, which details all the features of your chosen product including the applicable costs, compliance requirements, documentation required for commencing the registration process, as well as the standard processing timeframe.
Company Structure :
100% Ownership / FZ-LLC or LLC or FZCO
Location :
Dubai, Northern Emirates, Abu Dhabi
Visa Eligibility :
1 Visa
Facility :
Virtual Office or Physical Office
Activity :
We look forward to having you on board with us.
If you require any clarification, please don't hesitate to contact me any time via email or my cell.

div.style: font-family: Cairo, Inter, sans-serif; line-height: 180%; text-align: left; direction: ltr; letter-spacing: 0px; mso-line-height-alt: 16.8px;

p.span: Freezoner is an award winning, friendly, and cost-effective company that helps investors establish their business in the most cost-effective & efficient way in accordance with their needs.
We are offering a wide variety of 1st class business setup services in UAE that suits every stage of your business journey in UAE.
We are looking to collaborate with your esteemed law firm to support you with services that would add value to your business. Enclosed you will find all the services that we offer at Freezoner
If interested, lets schedule a meeting to discuss further on this collaboration.

div.style: font-family: Cairo, Inter, sans-serif; line-height: 180%; text-align: left; direction: ltr; letter-spacing: 0px; mso-line-height-alt: 16.8px;

p.span: Freezoner is an award winning, friendly, and cost-effective company that helps investors establish their business in the most cost-effective & efficient way.

We are offering a wide variety of 1st class business setup services in UAE that will include all licensing jurisdictions such as mainland, freezone & offshore, supporting it with residence visa processing for the shareholder/employee and their dependents, opening corporate bank account and much more.
Enclosed is our company profile for your review.
In case of any further clarification, please feel free to reach out.

p.span: Your company has been successfully incorporated, kindly find enclosed the following:

ol.li: MOA (MEMORANDUM & ARTICLES OF ASSOCIATION – Legal documents)

p.span: I would like to thank you for choosing Freezoner as your business setup consultancy firm.

The journey has just started, have a look at our value-added services that can benefit your company:
https://freezoner.net/add-ons-prices/
If any further clarifications required, kindly do not hesitate to contact me.

div.p:
Dear ,
Thank you for contacting
Freezoner

div.style: font-family: Cairo, Inter, sans-serif; line-height: 180%; text-align: left; direction: ltr; letter-spacing: 0px; mso-line-height-alt: 16.8px;

p.span: Reference to your inquiry, I have been trying to contact you today through phone calls and WhatsApp but was not able to reach you.
I would appreciate if you can let me know a good time to contact you so that we can discuss your inquiry further.

div.style: font-family: Cairo, Inter, sans-serif; line-height: 150%; text-align: left; direction: ltr; letter-spacing: 0px; mso-line-height-alt: 16.8px;

p.style: margin: 0; color: #020204; font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 40px;

div.style: color: #ffffff; font-size: 24px; font-family: Poppins, Inter, sans-serif; font-weight: 800; line-height: 120%; text-align: left; direction: ltr; letter-spacing: 0px; mso-line-height-alt: 28.799999999999997px;

Now

div.style: font-family: Cairo, Inter, sans-serif; line-height: 180%; text-align: left; direction: ltr; letter-spacing: 0px; mso-line-height-alt: 16.8px;

p.span: Reference your inquiry, I have been trying to contact you for the last two days through phone calls, WhatsApp and email but was not able to reach you.

I understand that you might be very busy with your work and hence not able to respond to the calls, WhatsApp and emails. I therefore request you to let me know a good time to contact you so that we can discuss your inquiry further.

div.style: font-family: Cairo, Inter, sans-serif; line-height: 150%; text-align: left; direction: ltr; letter-spacing: 0px; mso-line-height-alt: 16.8px;

p.style: margin: 0; color: #020204; font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; margin-bottom: 40px;

div.p:
I look forward to hearing back from you.
Yours Sincerely,
